generator.group: Harry Perkins Institute of Medical Research

contact.group: Harry Perkins Institute of Medical Research

publications.title: Generation of two iPSC lines from patients with inherited central core disease and concurrent malignant hyperthermia caused by dominant missense variants in the RYR1 gene

donor.disease_description: Central core disease and malignant hyperthermia due to dominant RYR1 variant (p.Val2168Met)
donor.disease_name: Central core disease; Malignant hyperthermia susceptibility 1

genomic_modifications.description: Inherited variant (dominant; multiple affected family members across generations)

genomic_characterisation.summary: Normal 46,XY karyotype at P19 by G-banding; 400 bands per haploid set; 15 metaphases counted and 5 analyzed.

ethics.institutional_HREC: University of Western Australia Human Research Ethics Committee
